fullDescription.intro:
This node returns HS numbers and related data to all chemical structures provided in a given column of the input DataTable by invoking ChemTS' integration endpoints.
Source code is available here.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The column of the input DataTable that holds the structures to get the HS information for.
HS information will be returned for the selected countries. No selection means, running for all countries.
The format of the input structures. If no format is specified ChemTS will try to recognize the format.

tab.name: Connection settings
tab.option: The type of authentication ChemTS integration endpoints use
The host machine for ChemTS cc-api service. (e.g: http://<host>:<port>)
Sets read and connection timeout for invoking ChemTS' endpoints.
The token endpoint used to retrieve access token. Should be set if 'OAuth2' authentication type is selected.
Client id used to retrieve the access token. Should be set if 'OAuth2' authentication type is selected.
Client secret used to retrieve the access token. Should be set if 'OAuth2' authentication type is selected.
Name of the user to authenticate against on the service calls. Should be set if 'Basic' authentication type is selected.
Password to authenticate against on the service calls. Should be set if 'Basic' authentication type is selected.

ports.inPort: DataTable containing the input structures that will be checked
ports.outPort: Records that could not be checked due to error
